content.text:
# Bibliography of the War in Darfur__disambig_1

This is the bibliography and reference section for the Darfur conflict series.  External links to reports, news articles and other sources of information may also be found below.
Maps
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20060731192831/http://www.usaid.gov/locations/sub-saharan_africa/sudan/satelliteimages.html Darfur Humanitarian Emergency: Satellite Imagery] from USAID
*[http://www.reliefweb.int/rw/rwb.nsf/db900SID/SKAR-64GDRR?OpenDocument&rc=1&emid=ACOS-635PJQ Reference maps of Sudan] from ReliefWeb, including many conflict maps from Darfur
*[https://maps.lib.utexas.edu/maps/sudan.html Sudan Maps] from the Perry–Castañeda Library Map Collection, includes both maps and USAID imagery
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20071224130801/http://www.ushmm.org/googleearth/projects/darfur/ Crisis in Darfur] imagery in Google Earth provided by the US Holocaust Memorial Museum
Published works
Books
* Burr, J. Millard and Robert O. Collins (2006) Darfur: The Long Road to Disaster, Markus Wiener, Princeton N.J.,
* Cheadle, Don and Prendergast, John (2007) Not on Our Watch: the mission to end genocide in Darfur and beyond Hyperion, New York,
* Daly, M.W. (2007) ''Darfur's Sorrow: A History of Destruction and Genocide, Cambridge University Press,
* de Waal, Alex (1989) Famine that Kills: Darfur, Sudan, Oxford University Press, New York, (Revised 2005)
* de Waal, Alex (editor) (2007) War in Darfur and the Search for Peace, Harvard University Press,
* Flint, Julie and Alex de Waal (2006) Darfur: A Short History of a Long War, Zed Books, London,
* Grzyb, Amanda (ed.) (2009) The World and Darfur: International Response to Crimes Against Humanity in Western Sudan'', McGill-Queen's University Press,
* Hari, Daoud (2008) ''The Translator: A Tribesman's Memoir of Darfur. New York: Random House,
* Hassan, Salah M. and Ray, Carina E. (editors) (2009) Darfur and the Crisis of Governance in Sudan: a critical reader Cornell University Press, Ithaca, New York,
* Hoile, David (2005) [https://web.archive.org/web/20071022113030/http://darfurinformation.com/pdf/Darfur-Book-New-Edition.pdf Darfur in Perspective] (Revised 2006) European-Sudanese Public Affairs Council, London,
* Johnson, Douglas H. (2003) The Root Causes of Sudan's Civil Wars, Indiana University Press,
* Mamdani, Mahmood (2009) Saviors and Survivors: Darfur, Politics, and the War on Terror Pantheon, New York,
* Prunier, Gérard (2005) Darfur: The Ambiguous Genocide, Cornell University Press,
* Steidle, Brian and Steidle Wallace, Gretchen (2007) The Devil Came on Horseback: Bearing Witness to the Genocide in Darfur , PublicAffairs,
* Srinivasan, Sharath (2021) [https://www.hurstpublishers.com/book/peace-kills-politics/When Peace Kills Politics: International Intervention and Unending Wars in the Sudans], Hurst & Co/Oxford University Press
* Totten, Samuel and Markusen, Eric (2006) Genocide in Darfur: Investigating the Atrocities in the Sudan Routledge, New York,
* Totten, Samuel (2012). An Oral and Documentary History of the Darfur Genocide. Santa Barbara, CA: Praeger Security International. (; )
Articles
* Campbell, David (2007) [https://web.archive.org/web/20110907035356/http://www.david-campbell.org/wp-content/uploads/2009/01/campbell-geopolitics-and-visuality-sighting-darfur-pol-geog-2007.pdf "Geopolitics and visuality: sighting the Darfur conflict"] Political Geography 26: pp. 357–382,
* Degomme, Olivier and Debarati Guha-Sapir (2010) "Patterns of mortality rates in Darfur conflict" The Lancet'' 375(9711): pp. 294–300, , [http://www.thelancet.com/journals/lancet/article/PIIS0140-6736%2809%2961967-X/abstract abstract]
* Ejibunu, Hassan Tai (2008) "Sudan Darfur Region's Crisis: Formula for Ultimate Solution"  EPU Research Papers Issue 09/08
* Elliesie, Hatem; Behrendt, Urs and Niway Zergie Aynalem  (2009) "Different Approaches to Genocide Trials under National Jurisdiction on the African Continent: The Rwandan, Ethiopian and Sudanese Cases" In: Recht in Afrika / Law in Africa / Droit en Afrique R. Köppe, Cologne, Germany, pp. 21–67,
* Elliesie, Hatem (2010) "Sudan under the Constraints of (International) Human Rights Law and Humanitarian Law: The Case of Darfur" In: Elliesie, Hatem (editor) (2010) Beiträge zum Islamischen Recht VII: Islam und Menschenrechte / Islam and Human Rights / al-islam wa-huquq al-insan P. Lang, Frankfurt a.M. pp. 193–218,
* Jafari, Jamal and Paul Williams (2005) [https://www.jurist.org/commentary/2005/03/word-games-un-and-genocide-in-darfur/ "Word Games: The UN and Genocide in Darfur"] JURIST
* Srinivasan, Sharath (2013) "Negotiating Violence: Sudan's Peacemakers and the War in Darfur" African Affairs [http://afraf.oxfordjournals.org/content/early/2013/12/17/afraf.adt072.full.pdf DOI: 10.1093/afraf/adt072]
Feature films
* All About Darfur (2005)
* The Art of Flight (2005)
* Darfur Diaries: Message from Home (2006)
* The Devil Came on Horseback (2007)
* Google Darfur (2007)
* Darfur Now (2007)
* Sand and Sorrow (2007)
* They Turned Our Desert Into Fire (2007)
Overviews and updating news aggregators
*[https://www.un.org/apps/news/infocusRel.asp?infocusID=88&Body=Sudan  "Sudan"], UN News Centre
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20040820033853/http://www.darfurinfo.org/ Darfur Information Center] of the University of Pennsylvania African Studies Center
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20111017021206/http://www.usaid.gov/locations/sub-saharan_africa/sudan/ Sudan page] of the United States Agency for International Development
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20110322093226/http://www.haguejusticeportal.net/eCache/DEF/6/177.c2V0TGFuZz1FTiZMPUVO.html Hague Justice Portal: Situation in Darfur]
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20141015171527/https://www.radiodabanga.org/ Radio Dabanga]
*[http://www.sudanupdate.org/REPORTS/PEOPLES/Darf.htm Sudan Update--The Peoples of Darfur—Background of the Darfur Conflict—Chronology 1983-1995]
;From mainstream media
*[https://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/in_depth/africa/2004/sudan/default.stm "In Depth - Sudan: A Nation Divided"] by BBC News
*[https://www.theguardian.com/sudan/ "Special Report: Sudan"] by Guardian Unlimited
*[https://www.pbs.org/newshour/world/darfur-and-abyei "The Darfur Crisis"] by The NewsHour, Public Broadcasting Service
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20050422183739/http://story.news.yahoo.com/fc?cid=34&tmpl=fc&in=World&cat=Sudan "Full Coverage: Sudan"] from Yahoo! News
* [https://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-srv/world/interactives/sudan/?hpid=specialreports The Darfur Tragedy] interactive from The Washington Post
* [http://www.alertnet.org/db/crisisprofiles/SD_DAR.htm Crisis briefing on Darfur] by Reuters AlertNet
;From advocacy organizations
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20040602204928/http://web.amnesty.org/pages/sdn-index-eng "Sudan: Crisis in Darfur"], Amnesty International reports
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20060630173417/http://www.crimesofwar.org/onnews/news-darfur.html The Darfur Conflict], Crimes of War Project
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20060912190754/http://www.crisisgroup.org/home/index.cfm?id=3060&l=1 Crisis in Darfur], International Crisis Group
*[https://www.hrw.org/campaigns/darfur/ "Crisis in Darfur"] , Human Rights Watch
;On specialized topics
* [http://jurist.law.pitt.edu/currentawareness/darfur.php "Darfur" - Legal News Archive] from JURIST
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20060615185039/http://www.ifex.org/en/content/view/full/42/ Aggregated information on media censorship in Sudan] from the International Freedom of Expression Exchange
* on Diplomacy Monitor
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20080317083807/http://www.netnebraska.org/extras/humanrights/02gen/0200/0200_01.htm Genocide & Crimes Against Humanity] - a learning resource, highlighting the cases of Myanmar, Bosnia, the DRC, and Darfur
Blogs, podcasts and websites of individuals
* Mia Farrow,  on Darfur issues
* Jan Pronk, [http://www.janpronk.nl/index120.html blog] of the UN special envoy to Sudan
* Ryan Spencer Reed, [http://www.ryanspencerreed.com/ Documentary photographic traveling exhibitions - Sudan: The Cost of Silence]
* Eric Reeves, [https://sudanreeves.org/ Sudan Research, Analysis, and Advocacy]
* Brian Steidle, [http://www.ushmm.org/conscience/alert/darfur/steidle/ article and photos]  taken as an African Union observer in 2004
* [https://web.archive.org/web/20060731190313/http://www.ushmm.org/conscience/podcasts/ Voices on Genocide Prevention], podcasts from the United States Holocaust Memorial Museum (not specific to Darfur)
* [https://www.gudmagazine.com/vault/3/How+to+Fetch+Firewood How to Fetch Firewood], a much-published poem dedicated to the women and children of Darfur; podcast
Reports and news articles (chronological)
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20070521021752/http://www.pulitzercenter.org/showproject.cfm?id=18 Pulitzer Center on Crisis Reporting] Video Reports on the Conflict in Darfur
* [https://www.amnesty.org/en/documents/afr54/008/2004/en/ Darfur: "too many people killed for no reason."], Amnesty International, 3 February 2004
* [http://www.crisisgroup.org/home/index.cfm?id=2550&l=1 "Darfur Rising: Sudan's New Crisis"] , International Crisis Group, 25 March 2004
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20040626121506/http://www.usaid.gov/press/frontlines/AprMay04_FrontLines.pdf Notes from Natsios: Sudan's Growing Crisis (PDF)], USAID newsletter FrontLines, April–May 2004 issue
* Alex de Waal, [http://www.lrb.co.uk/v26/n15/waal01_.html "Counter-Insurgency on the Cheap"], London Review of Books, August 5, 2004
* Mikael Nabati, [http://www.asil.org/insights/insigh142.htm "The U.N. Responds to the Crisis in Darfur:  Security Council Resolution 1556"], ASIL Insight 142, American Society of International Law, August 2004
* [https://web.archive.org/web/20070927224134/http://www.darfurcentre.ch/studies_research_papers/Genocide_in_Sudan__Parliamentary_Brief__UK__August_2004.pdf Genocide in Sudan], [http://www.thepolitician.org/ Parliamentary Brief], UK, August 2004
* [https://2001-2009.state.gov/g/drl/rls/36028.htm Documenting Atrocities in Darfur], United States Department of State, September 2004
* Alex de Waal, [https://web.archive.org/web/20061101184153/http://bostonreview.net/BR29.5/dewaal.html "Tragedy in Darfur"], Boston Review, October/November 2004
* [http://www.reliefweb.int/rw/RWB.NSF/db900SID/HMYT-697TAR?OpenDocument&rc=1&cc=sdn "Report of the International Commission of Inquiry on Darfur to the United Nations Secretary-General"] on reliefweb.int, 25 January 2005
* Alex Cobham, [https://web.archive.org/web/20070927224109/http://www.darfurcentre.ch/studies_research_papers/Causes_of_Conflicts_in_Sudan__Testing_the_Black_Book__Alex_Cobham.pdf Causes of Conflicts in Sudan, Testing the Black Book], January 2005
*Paul Reynolds, [https://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/africa/4226067.stm "Sudan atrocities strain US relations"], BBC News, 1 February 2005
* [http://www.iht.com/articles/2005/02/11/news/sudan.php " Painful legacy of Darfur's horrors: Children born of rape"], International Herald Tribune, 12 February 2005
* [https://web.archive.org/web/20061127191528/http://www.darfurconsortium.org/Assets/PDFs/DRDCPaperNo4.pdf "Darfur: no peace without justice"], [http://www.darfurcentre.ch/ Darfur Relief and Documentation Center (DRDC)] , 21 February 2005
* [https://web.archive.org/web/20060828130312/http://english.aljazeera.net/NR/exeres/EC6990D4-FD6D-47C9-B9E6-139A5B1C0F97.htm "ICC given Darfur suspect names"], Al Jazeera, 5 April 2005
* [http://www.cedat.be/sites/default/files/ID%20214%20-%20Counting%20the%20death%20(2).pdf Darfur: Counting the Deaths - Mortality Estimates from Multiple Survey Data] , Centre for Research on the Epidemiology of Disasters, 26 May 2005
* Jane Wells, [http://www.huffingtonpost.com/theblog/archive/jane-wells/witness-to-darfur-part-5_2095.html "Witness to Darfur"] five-part series, The Huffington Post, June 2005
*[https://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/africa/4526208.stm "UN refused access to Darfur to investigate atrocities"], BBC News, 13 December 2005
* Dorina Bekoe, [https://web.archive.org/web/20060801023338/http://www.usip.org/pubs/usipeace_briefings/2006/0125_darfur.html "Overcoming Obstacles to Humanitarian Assistance in Darfur"], US Institute of Peace, January 2006
*[http://www.nysoundposse.com/2006/04/event-best-hope-for-peace-in-darfur.html?wikipedia "The Best Hope for Peace in Darfur"] , panel discussion recorded at the New York Society for Ethical Culture (RAM and MP3 formats), April 19, 2006
*[http://www.cbc.ca/news/background/sudan/darfur.html "Crisis Zone: Darfur, Sudan"], Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, 24 May 2006
* [http://www.africanholocaust.net/news_ah/darfur%20report.html Darfur Report] , African Holocaust, June 2006
* [http://www.crisisgroup.org/home/index.cfm?id=4179&l=1 "Darfur's Fragile Peace Agreement"] , International Crisis Group, 20 June 2006
* Alex de Waal, "[https://archive.today/20130222230432/http://www.opendemocracy.net/democracy-africa_democracy/darfur_peace_3709.jsp Darfur's fragile peace]", opendemocracy.net, 5 July 2006
** Gérard Prunier, "[http://www.opendemocracy.net/democracy-africa_democracy/darfur_conflict_3909.jsp Darfur's Sudan problem]", opendemocracy.net, 15 September 2006 (in response to de Waal's article)
* Jonah Fisher, [https://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/programmes/from_our_own_correspondent/5224098.stm "Cracks emerge in Darfur peace deal"], BBC News From Our Correspondent, 29 July 2006
* Paul Reynolds, [https://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/africa/5317796.stm "Despair over Darfur"], BBC News, 6 September 2006
* [https://web.archive.org/web/20060918212331/http://www.africaaction.org/resources/page.php?op=read&documentid=2087&type=6&issues=1024 "A Tale of Two Genocides: The Failed U.S. Response to Rwanda and Darfur"], Africa Action, 9 September 2006
* [http://www.irinnews.org/S_report.asp?ReportID=55502 "SUDAN: Rebel fragmentation hampers Darfur peace"], IRIN, 11 September 2006
* Jonah Fisher, [https://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/africa/5354836.stm "No end in sight to Darfur troubles"], BBC News, 18 September 2006
* Sharath Srinivasan, [https://web.archive.org/web/20091029175244/http://www.minorityrights.org/965/micro-studies/minority-rights-early-warning-and-conflict-prevention-lessons-from-darfur.html "Minority Rights, Early Warning and Conflict Prevention: Lessons from Darfur"], Minority Rights Group, September 2006
* Karen Allen, [https://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/africa/6049094.stm "Q&A: Your questions about Darfur"], BBC News, 13 October 2006
*[https://www.cbsnews.com/video/searching-for-jacob/ "Searching for Jacob"], 60 Minutes, 22 October 2006
*"[https://web.archive.org/web/20070928153009/http://www.pulitzercenter.org/openitem.cfm?id=182 Our Choice, Too: On the Edge in Darfur]" (video) from the Pulitzer Center on Crisis Reporting, 2006
* [https://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/africa/3496731.stm "Q&A on the Darfur conflict"], BBC News, updated 27 February 2007
* [http://hiram7.wordpress.com/2007/06/25/france-and-usa-push-darfur-action "France and USA push Darfur action"], HIRAM7 REVIEW, 25 June 2007
* R. Green, [http://www.memri.org/bin/articles.cgi?Page=archives&Area=ia&ID=IA45308 "Reacations in the Sudanese Press to the Darfur Rebel Attack on Omdurman"], Middle East Media Research Institute, 9 July 2008
* R. Green, [http://www.memri.org/bin/articles.cgi?Page=archives&Area=ia&ID=IA45708 "Controversy in the Arab World Over ICC Indictment of Sudan President Al-Bashir"], Middle East Media Research Institute, 24 July 2008
* [http://blogs.ssrc.org/darfur/2009/06/28/measuring-the-drowned-and-the-saved-in-sudan Measuring the Drowned and the Saved in Sudan], Michael Deibert, 28 June 2009,  Social Science Research Council
